definitions: Moves by hopping lightly on one foot and then the other.
Jumps over a rope as a game or exercise.
Omits or leaves out something, typically intentionally.
Avoids dealing with or mentioning something.
Moves quickly and lightly from one place or subject to another.
examples: He skips his turn in the game.
The song skips to the next track.
He skips the boring parts of the book.
